import * as request from "../../utils/request"; import images from "../../assets/images"; import "./payment.css"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; function Payment(){ const [infoForPayment, setInfoForPayment] = useState([]); const [vouchers, setVoucher] = useState([]); const [shipInformation, setShipInformation] = useState({ name_ship: '', numberPhone_ship: '', address_ship: '', option_thanhpho: '', option_quan: '', option_phuong: '', }); const handleInputShipInformation = (e) => { e.persist(); setShipInformation({...shipInformation, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); } const handleGetInfoForPayment = () => { const conditionToGetInfoForPayment = { matk: localStorage.getItem('auth_matk'), selected: 1, } request.get("/api/infoForPayment", conditionToGetProductOrder) .then(res => { console.log(res.data); setInfoForPayment(res.data); }) } const renderInfoProductOrders = infoProductOrders.map(item => { return ( {item.TENSP}
{item.TENMAU}, {item.MASIZE} {item.GIABAN} {item.SOLUONG} {item.TONGGIA} ) }) useEffect(()=> { handleGetInfoForPayment(); },[]); const data_shipInformation = { name: shipInformation.name_ship, numberPhone: shipInformation.numberPhone_ship, address: shipInformation.address_ship + ", " + shipInformation.option_phuong + ", " + shipInformation.option_quan + ", " + shipInformation.option_thanhpho, } return (

); } export default Payment;
